description:
When Status of Job Applicant Status is updated > update the status of the 
Opportunity Consulting Detail CT > stage field based on priority

fields.label: Opportunity Consulting Stage
fields.options:
Need Analysis
Proposal Sent
Negotiation
NPro Candidate Sourcing
Client CV Screening
Client Interview
Candidate Selected
Candidate On-Boarded
PO Pending
Won
Lost

fields.label: Job Applicant Status

Open
Replied
Pending for Internal Screening
CV Shared with Client
CV Selected for Interview
CV Rejected
Interview Scheduled
Rejected by Client
Rejected by Candidate
Hold
Accepted

name: Opportunity Job Applicant Status Priority Mapping
